articles.author: Tom Blow
articles.title: Man Utd news: Erik ten Hag's three-man transfer shortlist to replace Wout Weghorst - The Mirror
articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag has one eye on the summer transfer window - as the Dutchman looks to finally replace Portugal international Cristiano Ronaldo
articles.content:
It's been a season of revival for Manchester United under Erik ten Hag.
 The Red Devils are on course to qualify for the Champions League - sitting third in the Premier League - and ended their six-… [+2970 chars]
